text: Release focused mainly on sharing encrypted PDF Annotations for the Board Room:
Added Indicators on each Member in PDF Info to show when Annotations are shared & received.
Added Counter and Sticker "New" when new Annotations are received.
Added Toasters and Info Widgets to enhance Annotations Sharing experience.
Ability to select & delete easily ALL your own Annotations.
Ability to share PDF Annotations to Channels.
Enhanced Privacy: text on PDF cannot be copied when shared as "View Only".
Enhanced Cybersecurity Measures following cyber audit & pen tests.
Bug Fixes & Other Improvements mainly for Annotations in PDF.
